item.title: Redefining Time: Introducing New Words for a Fundamental Dimension
item.description: Explore the intricacies of time and the need for new vocabulary to distinguish between the societal construct of time and the fundamental dimension itself. Discover the proposed terms "chronos" for the flow of time and "kairos" for the measure of time, as we delve into the technical and philosophical aspects of this essential concept.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: Harnessing Nikola Teslas Legacy The Path to Secure Energy and Wireless Power Transmission
item.description: This post delves into Nikola Teslas groundbreaking ideas for Secure energy and wireless power transmission, exploring how these technologies could revolutionize our energy infrastructure, create a sustainable future, and bolster national security.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: The Magic of Wireless Power Transmission: Unleashing Teslas Vision
item.description: This post explores the fascinating world of wireless power transmission and its potential to revolutionize the way we power our devices and create captivating lighting shows. We delve into the math and physics behind resonant inductive coupling and provide a guide for building your own Tesla coil-based wireless power devices.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: The Relativity of Time: How Size and Speed Affect the Temporal Experience
item.description: Explore the fascinating world of relative time and how size and speed affect the temporal experience of organisms and objects. From the rapid growth of bacteria in warm environments to the mind-bending implications of Einsteins theory of relativity, discover how time is not a universal constant but a relative experience that varies across scales and velocities.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: Acoustic Quantum Computing Harnessing the Power of Sound
item.description: This post explores an innovative approach to building a quantum computer using tuning forks and acoustic frequencies. By leveraging the quantum properties of sound waves, we propose a novel method for creating and manipulating qubits, potentially opening new avenues for quantum computing research.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: Quantum Research & Applications From Theory to Transformation ðŸ”¬
item.description: Diving into the world of quantum research and witnessing its transformative applications across sectors!
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: Quantum Potential & Capabilities Unraveling the Quantum Revolution ðŸŒŒ
item.description: Discovering the transformative potential and multifaceted capabilities of quantum technologies!
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: The Vacuum Balloon: Exploring the Science and Feasibility of Lifting Payloads to Space
item.description: This blog post explores the intriguing concept of using a vacuum balloon to lift payloads to space. By examining the physics behind this idea, including buoyancy, atmospheric pressure, and material properties, we delve into the challenges and potential of this innovative approach to space exploration.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: Enigma of Gravity
item.description: Embark on a journey through the captivating world of gravity, exploring its classical interpretations, potential connections to electromagnetism and quantum mechanics, and the cutting-edge theories that may revolutionize our understanding of this fundamental force.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: Quantum Supremacy: Unveiling the Future of Computing with Michio Kaku
item.description: Explore the groundbreaking world of quantum computing with renowned physicist Michio Kaku in his captivating book, 'Quantum Supremacy.' Discover how this revolutionary technology is set to transform industries, solve complex problems, and shape the future of computing and human civilization.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: Exploring the Mysteries of Quantum Physics ðŸ’¡
item.description: Unlocking the secrets of the universe with the fascinating field of Quantum Physics!
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: AC vs DC: Understanding the Differences ðŸ”Œ
item.description: AC and DC are two types of electric current. Learn about the differences between AC and DC current, including frequency, direction, polarity, and applications.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: College Physics 2 Rotational Motion, Vibrations and Waves, Fluid Mechanics, thermodynamics, and Electromagnetism ðŸ“š
item.description: College Physics 2 is a continuation of College Physics 1. It covers more advanced topics in mechanics, thermodynamics, electromagnetism, and waves.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: Physics 1 Exploring the Physical World ðŸ”­
item.description: College Physics 1 is a foundational course that introduces students to the basic concepts of physics, including mechanics, thermodynamics, electromagnetism, and waves.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: Heliums Funny Effect: Why Does Helium Make Your Voice Sound Funny?
item.description: Inhaling helium from a balloon can make your voice sound high-pitched and squeaky. In this blog post, we explore the science behind why helium changes your voice and the principles of sound waves and density.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: ðŸ‘» Dancing Ghosts: Exploring Static Electricity with Tissue Paper ðŸ‘»
item.description: Learn about static electricity with this fun experiment that makes tissue paper ghosts dance. This blog post explains the science behind static electricity and provides detailed steps for conducting this experiment with kids, either one-on-one or in a classroom setting.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.description: Create your own lava lamp and learn about liquid density and immiscibility. This blog post explains the science behind a homemade lava lamp and provides detailed steps for conducting this experiment with kids, either one-on-one or in a classroom setting.
